org.gwtbootstrap3.extras.bootbox.client

Class Bootbox

  • Object
    • Bootbox

  • public class Bootbox
extends Object
    Bootbox.js is a small JavaScript library which allows you to create programmatic dialog boxes using Bootstrap modals.
    Author:
    Xiaodong Sun
    See Also:
    http://bootboxjs.com/

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Bootbox() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void alert(AlertOptions options)
      Displays a customized alert with the given AlertOptions.
      static void alert(String msg)
      Displays a message in a modal dialog box.
      static void alert(String msg, SimpleCallback callback)
      Displays a message in a modal dialog box.
      static void confirm(ConfirmOptions options)
      Displays a customized confirm with the given ConfirmOptions.
      static void confirm(String msg, ConfirmCallback callback)
      Displays a message in a modal dialog box, along with the standard 'OK' and 'Cancel' buttons.
      static void dialog(DialogOptions options)
      Displays a completely customizable dialog in a modal dialog box.
      static void hideAll()
      Hide all currently active bootbox dialogs.
      static void init(SimpleCallback callback)
      Sets a callback when dialog gets initialized.
      static void prompt(PromptOptions options)
      Displays a customized prompt with the given PromptOptions.
      static void prompt(String msg, PromptCallback callback)
      Displays a request for information in a modal dialog box, along with the standard 'OK' and 'Cancel' buttons.
      static void setDefaults(DialogOptions options)
      Set many of the default options shown in the dialog example.

      Many of these options are also applied to the basic wrapper methods and can be overridden whenever the wrapper methods are invoked with a single options argument.
      static void setLocale(BootboxLocale locale)
      Sets a locale.

      • alert

        public static void alert(String msg)
        Displays a message in a modal dialog box.
        Parameters:
        msg - the message to be displayed.

      • alert

        public static void alert(String msg,
                         SimpleCallback callback)
        Displays a message in a modal dialog box. With callback handler.
        Parameters:
        msg - the message to be displayed.
        callback - the callback handler.

      • alert

        public static void alert(AlertOptions options)
        Displays a customized alert with the given AlertOptions.
        Parameters:
        options -

      • confirm

        public static void confirm(String msg,
                           ConfirmCallback callback)
        Displays a message in a modal dialog box, along with the standard 'OK' and 'Cancel' buttons.
        Parameters:
        msg - the message to be displayed.
        callback - the callback handler.

      • confirm

        public static void confirm(ConfirmOptions options)
        Displays a customized confirm with the given ConfirmOptions.
        Parameters:
        options -

      • prompt

        public static void prompt(String msg,
                          PromptCallback callback)
        Displays a request for information in a modal dialog box, along with the standard 'OK' and 'Cancel' buttons.
        Parameters:
        msg - the message to be displayed.
        callback - the callback handler.

      • prompt

        public static void prompt(PromptOptions options)
        Displays a customized prompt with the given PromptOptions.
        Parameters:
        options -

      • dialog

        public static void dialog(DialogOptions options)
        Displays a completely customizable dialog in a modal dialog box.
        Parameters:
        options - the dialog options.

      • init

        public static void init(SimpleCallback callback)
        Sets a callback when dialog gets initialized.
        Parameters:
        callback -

      • setDefaults

        public static void setDefaults(DialogOptions options)
        Set many of the default options shown in the dialog example.

        Many of these options are also applied to the basic wrapper methods and can be overridden whenever the wrapper methods are invoked with a single options argument.
        Parameters:
        options -

      • setLocale

        public static void setLocale(BootboxLocale locale)
        Sets a locale.
        Parameters:
        locale - if null, defaults to BootboxLocale.EN.

      • hideAll

        public static void hideAll()
        Hide all currently active bootbox dialogs.

        Individual dialogs can be closed as per normal Bootstrap dialogs: dialog.modal('hide').
